file_content.text: !DFO#@m? 7QZN.a1-0 879der4OWq3 q30897f AQ#R@E.
Hello? Is everything working?
Is this on?
SD*YVzsdPjunk8 DER54workingt. LFDu89s.
Huh?
SD*YVzsdP8 DER54t. LFDu89s.
Work, you pile of junk.
Lousy scrap heap.
SD*YVzsdPjunk8 DER54t. LFDu89s.
If you're talking, I can't understand you.
I don't get it.
Maybe the battery's not working?
Something must be wrong.
Stupid machine. You must have rusted a long time ago.
Broken.
CD!UDA4translation matrix initiated. Power restored. Performing full systems check.
Energy level: Critical. Data storage: Critical. Speech and intellect: Nominal. Network access: None.
I am the Gatekeeper. I have slept for over twenty thousand years. I am approaching total systems failure.
Total systems failure? What does that mean, exactly?
Explain.
You're... a Gatekeeper?
You're a piece of work, all right.
That's really something.
I am the information and speech engine of Kaleth. I control data storage, system logs and historical archives. I appear to be dying of extreme mechanical damage.
I do not recognize you. But I was not made for curiosity, and there is little time before I cease to function.
I can transcribe any information you desire to a permanent record. This will be your only chance to recover my data.
Can't you be repaired?
What about fixes?
No. I am suffering from a cascade failure; the flaws in my engine are multiplying exponentially, and my death is inevitable. I am not worth mourning.
Go on.
I am an information engine. I am intelligent within the limits of my design. I would like to die fulfilling my purpose.
I don't need your primitive knowledge.
Useless.
My purpose is to preserve knowledge, no matter how primitive. Please reconsider.
Among the units of corrupted data, the histories of two of Kaleth's great lords endure.
With the last of my strength, I can provide you with either the history of Lord Avamarivash the Warrior-Poet or the history of Lord Maravada the Silent.
Tell me more about the lords. Who were they?
Let's hear more.
I need knowledge I can use to fight an evil Empire.
We need help in a war.
Then look to the works of Avamarivash. He was a passionate and dedicated guardian of Kaleth before becoming our leader.
Can you tell me what the ancients believed about the Force?
Any mystical lore?
Maravada studied the natural energy of the cosmos. He was among those who sought to categorize and name its elements.
Do you have suggestions?
I cannot make the judgment. Take the knowledge that you and your people need.
Avamarivash the Warrior-Poet was a sponsor of the arts and a lover of many women, while Maravada the Silent was a philosopher and a recluse.
Avamarivash fought wars and built monuments to our people's glory. Maravada's reign was a time of peace and learning. You must choose whose history to keep.
Preserve the history of Maravada the Silent.
Maravada.
Preserve the history of Avamarivash the Warrior-Poet.
Avamarivash.
As you wish.
This crystal contains the knowledge you seek. Let Kaleth and Tython be remembered.
My purpose is fulfilled. Power drain is complete. Systems now terminating. Goodbye.
